desc.p: Date on which the New Spread or Rate is to be applied to the Contracts.
Existing Spread or Rate that was defined in the LD.GROUP.CONDITION for Loan Contracts.
Existing Spread or Rate that was defined in the LD.GROUP.CONDITION for Deposit Contracts.
When there is any rate or spread change in the LD.GROUP.CONDITION file, Then that change is written in this file. The ID of this file is same as LD.GROUP.CONDITION id.
New Spread or Rate defined in the LD.GROUP.CONDITION that is applicable to the Deposit Contracts.
New Spread or Rate defined in the LD.GROUP.CONDITION that is applicable to the Loan Contracts.
Existing Spread or Rate that was defined in the LD.GROUP.CONDITION for Deposit Contracts.
Existing Spread or Rate that was defined in the LD.GROUP.CONDITION for Loan Contracts.
Date on which the New Spread or Rate is to be applied to the Contracts.
When there is any rate or spread change in the LD.GROUP.CONDITION file,
Then that change is written in this file.
The ID of this file is same as LD.GROUP.CONDITION id.
New Spread or Rate defined in the LD.GROUP.CONDITION that is applicable to the Deposit Contracts.
New Spread or Rate defined in the LD.GROUP.CONDITION that is applicable to the Loan Contracts.
